messages.subject: Joyce Fetteroll (and how cool she is)
messages.msgSnippet: Someone wrote Joyce a long thank-you note, Joyce shared it with me because my name was in it, I wrote to the author to ask if I could quote it on my Joyce
messages.messageBody:
Someone wrote Joyce a long thank-you note, Joyce shared it with me because my name was in it, I wrote to the author to ask if I could quote it on my Joyce page, and she said yes.

http://sandradodd.com/joycefetteroll

If you also think Joyce is cool and might like to hang out with her for a few days, please consider asking for this for Christmas (or winter-holiday of your preference, or birthday, or something):

http://sandradodd.com/all

Bonus gift opportunities: Deb Lewis, Jill Parmer, Pam Sorooshian, Rosie her daughter, me and Holly and Marty.

Renting the hotel rooms gets us the meeting rooms (or Keith will pay for them; that's what I asked for for Christmas--financial backing in case of shortfall), and paying the conference fee gets transportation for speakers, and supplies and snacks for attendees.

Maybe you live where winter isn't very cold or fun, and coming to Albuquerque you might get a little taste of cold (possibly even desert snow; if it snows early in the week, it will melt before you leave), and if you live where winter is very cold, you can come and get a not-so-cold very-sunny break from winter.


Sandra
